SummaryEnglish: Shiego Kageyama "Mob" Is 14 year old who has trouble's with his emotions and and psychic powers reigen arataka continues to use mob for money and other stuff but Mob Is a Smart And Creative Young Man. While if he hit 100% of his power's bad things starts to happen to him. How Long Can He Keep This Up?

1.SummaryEnglish: Mob and Tatsumaki Have Feelings for each other and they both express it even tho Tatsumaki is 28 years old and mob is 14 which means she can end up being mob's mother.

2.SummaryEnglish: Genos see's how strong Mob is instead of stalking Saitama he stalk's Mob to see how he got so strong like Saitama.

3.SummaryEnglish: Mob and Tatsumaki are looking for villain for the hero association while Saitama And Genos are out shopping for dinner Mob and Tatsumaki run's in Lord Of The Rings "Doro" he's came to destory earth but luckily mob wasn't letting that happen.

4.SummaryEnglish: Mob And KJ Are out with Some friends while there being robbed by for black men in suit's Mob's friend tell's him to use his power's but refuses and KJ Gets shot 10 times but no one noticed.

5.TitleEnglish: The KJ Murder Case 2: The 2 Psychics
5.SummaryEnglish: Mob and Reigen are looking for the 3 killers the killed KJ Luckily KJ Was able to make it alive so Mob Hunts The Killers down without reigen.

6.SummaryEnglish: Mob And Reigen found 2 of the 3rd killer was the main killer and to find out the 3rd killer was killed by other suspect.

7.TitleEnglish: The KJ Murder Case 5: Mob's Arc
7.SummaryEnglish: Mob And Ritsu are still hunting The Killer Of KJ But Reigen was kidnapped by GANG Of the Killers the wanted 100,000,000 for Reigen.

8.SummaryEnglish: To figure out the Killer was ManPan A 40 Year Old Mob Boss who also want's Mob they want Saitama to Kill Him but luckily Mob Was Already meeting ManPan

9.TitleEnglish: The KJ Murder Case 7: Mob Vs ManPan
9.SummaryEnglish: In order to get Revenge Mob Fights ManPan and Saitama arrives on Time but Saitama sits back and Watch While Mob Fights ManPan

10.TitleEnglish: The KJ Murder Case 8: One Punch
10.SummaryEnglish: Saitama defeats ManPan with one Punch all they need to do is hunt the 5th killer of Kj!

11.SummaryEnglish: While Saitama is fighting The 5th killer Of KJ. Mob goes to check on KJ in the Hospital.

12.TitleEnglish: The KJ Murder Case 10: Psychic Punch
12.SummaryEnglish: Mob And Saitama Team And Makes The Strongest Punch In History "Killer Move: Psychic Punch" and defeats the entire planet lncluding earth. the entire earth was destoryed and Mob And Saitama Never Used That Punch Again.

13.TitleEnglish: The KJ Murder Case 10: SPEED DEMON
13.SummaryEnglish: Mob And Saitama are 99% percent close to finding KJ Killer and they have the fight the boss man!

14.SummaryEnglish: KJ's killer Taruto has finally been caught by Mob And Saitama and Taruto is a psychic kid who is only 19 years old and wants to kill Mob for his psychic powers but ends up fighting

15.SummaryEnglish: Mob is overflowed with rage and almost kills taruto until Saitama holds Mob back and handles the fight by ending it with one punch!

1.SummaryEnglish: Mob goes into Minecraft until he notice he was being followed by Steve And Other They Tried to attack Mob but they didn't know mob was powerful esper so Mob And Brine Fought From Other dimension Called "Roblox" Were Mob Goes Full 100% And Brine only using 50% of his power but then brine and mob goes back into Minecraft and fought this time Mob Almost Won The Until Brine Hit 100% And The Battle Start's!

2.SummaryEnglish: While Mob is taking about his feeling's he run's into reigen "The Greatest Psychic Of 21st Century" and Reigen notice that Mob Has Psychic Power's And use's him but Mob doesn't know that so Reigen and Mob Find's A Way to Get out the desert but stay's in minecraft so They go and find there way Mob Doesn't feel okay around reigen but Mob is nice and decides to go Until Herobrine is stalking and only using 80% of his power there's evil around them.

4.SummaryEnglish: Mob Goes full 100% and fight's herobrine for good until Herobrine is at his 100% and it was getting tricky for mob so Herobrine level things up and started throwing rocks at mob until mob loses while walking up to herobrine and this time herobrine is in big trouble Mob finally hit's ???%

5.SummaryEnglish: Mob Is at ???% Percent Which mean's he is unconsious and he isn't fighting herobrine it's his Evil Spirt's inside him herobrine Which is at 500% of his power fight's mob while reigen and ritsu and teru Dimple Watche's mob at ???% watching far mob finally defeat's Hero brine for good from Minecraft!

6.SummaryEnglish: Reigen Arataka the psychical scammer who uses mob for money and is finally starting a business

7.SummaryEnglish: Ritsu has been kidnapped by a gang and is know under trouble mob is filled with rage and is know on the look for ritsu

8.SummaryEnglish: Ritsu gain's psychic power's finally but can't use them since he is stuck in a room alone with mob and teru and know they have figure a plan to escape.

9.SummaryEnglish: Speednic O Sonic is Ninja born in The Ninja Village For 4 years just to find worthy fighter and he runs into saitama.

10.SummaryEnglish: Saitama and Reigen are finding monsters in City B while Mob And Ritsu And Teru are In City A 10 Mintues away from them they find monster called "King Koil"

1.SummaryEnglish: Mob A Normal Middle Schooler Enjoys his day until Him and Reigen Fights Off And Wins And Later Mob Vs A Robot And Mob Get Angry And Mad Goes ???% And Robot Destroys it and Once Mob Try's to Pass ???% which mob exe.subconsious (///%) But Instead his placed into his mind by his evil twin by (Shiego Kageyama V2) And Mob Learns when he pass ???% he wont be in control at all so Mob Get warned and after kicked out Mob Meets Second Robot From A Group Called Tail Evil organization Goes After Strong Psychic's And There coming for Mob

2.SummaryEnglish: Mob And Ritsu Having a Brother Bond Moment Until Herobrine Returns Tell his master about "Shiego Kageyama" power's there planning to get shiego and take over but didn't they had "Saitama" Strongest Out of all them While Mob And Ritsu are walking an Evil Enderman Came To Get Mob But Luckily The Enderman knew how strongest Mob Was So He Undergrounded away But so Mob And Ritsu Goes Home And Hours later The Leader Of The Place "ZaroB" Came to defeat Mob But Mob Handled It So Herobrine Tell's The Leader "Jaw" Stronger than everyone Say's that it's his time to step in Saitama Knows And Warns And They Both go after Jaw Who Will Win?

3.SummaryEnglish: Mob and Saitama has joined the hero house to become official hero's!

4.SummaryEnglish: SAITAMA is enjoying his day speaking to his friend "Dave" ~Villager~ while Mob is in danger by Speed O Sound Sonic Who is after a Saitama and Speed O Sound Sonic defeats Mob cause Mob doesn't wanna use his power so Saitama runs into Speed O Sound Sonic they fight Saitama defeats speed o sound Sonic and is know on strike to hunt Saitama and Now Hero Hunter Garou is on a hunt!

5.SummaryEnglish: Garou A Human Who Calls Himself A Monster and wants to hunt all hero's to gain energy from their blood and also steals move's from hero's to gain stronger powers hunting the S class hero "Tiger Speed"

6.SummaryEnglish: The Monster House has taken over the city while Mob And Saitama are in City C exploring other monster while other S Class hero's are looking for Mob "Shiego Kageyama" S Class Rank 3 stealing Silver fang's place.

7.SummaryEnglish: Tatsumaki is hunting Garou the hero hunter but Garou is on the foot while ritsu and teru are facing challenges against the monster house while the hero house are looking for the monster Saitama and Mob are still In CITY B!

8.SummaryEnglish: Reigen Has officially came to help the hero's Tatsumaki and Reigen has to work together in order to defeat the monster house while "Lord Famous" has came to defeat Saitama And Mob.

9.SummaryEnglish: Famous a monster who has came to take over the world and is lord of the monster's and Mob just siting back and watch his father fight while the S class hero's are dealing with the strongest monster with the monster house while Garou is still on the Hunt S Class Hero Genos fight Garou.

10.SummaryEnglish: Nebz if friend of Mob And Has Been friends ever since Pre-K and Nebz is 14 himself while Saitama handles "Lord Famous" Mob And Nebz goes back to City A to Help other S Class Hero's.

11.SummaryEnglish: Saitama finally finishes Lord Famous And He Jumps really far using Killer Move : Serious Jumpers While Mob Defeats The Monsters there's one more Monster Garou is fighting against A Class Hero's fighting against Genos, Teru , Ritsu , Silverfang

12.SummaryEnglish: Saitama meets all the monsters and Mob the both uses a Seious move called "Psychic Punch" the strongest punch in minecraft anime and defeats half of the earth with the punch and Garou has been kidnapped by the monster house and everything was cleaned back to normal until Garou returns...

3.SummaryEnglish: Mob Psycho lnto Minecraft is set to premiere in October 5th 2025!
